sentences.en: " Hey!'says the guy as he pokes the application. " At least I'm not a quitter. "
sentences.cn: “ 嘿! ” 那人指着申请表说, “ 至少我不是个逃兵. ”

sentences.en: A winner never quits a quitter never wins.
sentences.cn: 胜利者从不放弃,放弃者从不会获胜.

sentences.en: He is a quitter who is temperamentally unsuited to remaining a champion.
sentences.cn: 他是个遇难而退的人，照他的性格，不可能长期保住冠军的称号。

sentences.en: He was tagged as a quitter.
He won't resign because he's not a quitter.
sentences.cn: 他不会辞职，因为他不是个半途而废的人。

sentences.en: I have never been a quitter.
sentences.cn: 我从未是半途而废的人.

sentences.en: I've asked you to do this for me because I know you're not a quitter.
sentences.cn: 我要求你为我做这件事,因为我知道你做事不虎头蛇尾.

sentences.en: I've heard her called a quitter for leaving and aimless wanderer.
sentences.cn: 在那儿,她又能推倒陈腐的围墙,树起全新的理念.

sentences.en: Il attaque la politique de Napoleon III et doit , en 1851 , quitter la France pendant vingt ans.
sentences.cn: 他攻击拿破仑三世的政治主张,并由此于1851年离开了法国长达20年.

sentences.en: J attends un client tr è s important et je ne peux quitter mon burequ.
sentences.cn: 我在等一位重要的客户,离不开办公室.请您原谅.

sentences.en: Quitter never win, and winners never quit.
sentences.cn: 半途而废的人永不会胜利, 而胜者永不会半途而废.

trans.tran_cn: <贬>有始无终的人，虎头蛇尾的人，半途而废者
trans.tran_en: someone who does not have the determination or courage to finish something that is difficult
